title: Quozl
description: The sci-fi comedy classic that fans will flip over!From the bestselling author of Jed the Dead--here is the out-of-this-world comedy that introduced "Flip-A-Mation" (animated flip art inside each book) and the most lovable aliens in the universe...The Quozl knew they'd love the third planet from the sun. But it never occurred to them that anyone lived there... Includes "Flip-A-Mation" art inside each book!
author: Alan Dean Foster
